Text: The phone itself is pretty nice.  Camera quality isn't bad for the low resolution.  Menu is a bit slow, but overall, phone is very functional.  But watch the Amazon rebates on these (T-Mobile rebate is fine).  You have to wait to get your second bill before you can send the rebate form in. \  Depending on the timing of the postmark date, you don't get your second bill until the postmark date passes, so it's impossible to qualify for the rebate.
